node.title: 'The anxiety had taken hold': How care in a psychiatric ward for new mothers saved Renee's life
node.alt: A smiling woman in a black and white jumper with a smiling boy wearing a red jumper.
node.description: In the past year, there has been a 50 per cent increase in the number of new parents asking for help before or after the birth of a child because they are struggling with their mental health.
node.content:
["Adjusting to life as a new parent is a lesson in sleepless nights and exhaustion, but for Renee Knight it descended into something else.", "\"I became aware about six weeks after my son was born that the feelings I was having were not normal,\" Ms Knight said.", "After more than a week without sleep, she took to Google in an effort to figure out what was wrong.", "\"We thought I had postnatal depression and anxiety so I quickly reached out for help and tried to get some medical help through the GP,\" she said.", "\"It took about two weeks to really get the help I needed and in that time my mental health deteriorated to the point that I really was in a suicidal state.\"", "Ms Knight ended up in the emergency department at Werribee's Mercy Hospital, a move she credited with saving her life.", "\"I was admitted to the mother-baby unit, which was a really scary moment for me, but at the same time, I just needed to do what I could to look after my mental health,\" she said.", "\"At that point, I just wanted somebody to take me away in an ambulance and look after me.", "\"Three months after having my first baby, [that] was not how I envisaged my maternity leave.\"", "After six weeks, she was released from hospital, but a relapse meant another five-week stay not long after.", "", "
Ms Knight says she felt lost in the system when she was struggling after Fletcher's birth.(ABC News: Nicole Asher)
", "
One in five women struggle around birth
", "Experiences like Ms Knight's are far from uncommon.", "About 20 per cent of women struggle with their mental health either before or after giving birth.", "If a mother experiences perinatal mental illness, there's a one in eight chance their partner will too.", "Dr Blankley is the deputy clinical services director at Mercy Mental Health and gave evidence to Victoria's\u00a0Mental Health Royal Commission.", "", "
Psychiatrist Gaynor Blankley says extra\u00a0funding will help respond to increasing demand for perinatal mental health\u00a0care.(ABC News: Nicole Asher)
", "The state government\u00a0has announced an extra $6.89 million to improve the availability of\u00a0mental health services.", "\"The funding to date has tended to be in major centres,\" Dr Blankley said.", "\"This funding will address access to the right care in the right place at the right time.\"", "Mental Health Minister James Merlino said the extra funding built on $20 million included in the budget.", "\"This additional funding will provide, in just one year alone, more than 5,300 hours of support for women and their partners,\" Mr Merlino said.", "\"It's both a response to all of the issues raised through the Mental Health Royal Commission as well as the impact of the pandemic.", "\"We've seen an increase in demand and we need to respond to that.\"", "
Mothers seeking support\u00a0can feel\u00a0judged
", "Perinatal Anxiety and Depression Australia (PANDA) has had an almost 51 per cent increase in the number of new parents calling for help in the past 12 months.", "In Victoria, there was a 44 per cent rise in the number of people asking for assistance.", "\"We can't keep up with demand, we don't have enough funding nationally or in Victoria,\" PANDA chief executive Julie Borninkhof said.", "\"Our rates that we thought would drop after COVID\u00a0have remained stable, haven't gone anywhere and have kept climbing.", "\"More money is always welcome, but the money needs to be used in the right way and we need to think about leveraging off existing services to build better capability, reinforcing the system that is there and addressing the gaps.\"", "For Ms Knight, who felt lost in the system while searching desperately for the right help, that rang true.", "\"Anything we can do to provide support to women and their families earlier, and early intervention is absolutely key.\"", "The Mental Health Royal Commission heard from mothers who felt judged for their parenting when trying to access postnatal support, or found they were either too sick or not sick enough to get help.", "It recommended reform and expansion of community perinatal mental health services.", "", "
Mercy Health group chief executive officer Stephen Cornelissen welcomes the extra money.(ABC News: Nicole Asher)
", "The head of the Mercy Health group, Stephen Cornelissen, said funding for perinatal mental health had historically fallen short.", "\"Of course we want money yesterday, we want services yesterday, that's the way we are but I think it's a fair timing and a fair amount to get the services out that we need,\" Mr Cornelissen said.", "Mercy Health's Werribee hospital, in Melbourne's outer west, has a six-bed inpatient psychiatric ward for new mothers.", "It's where Ms Knight was treated.", "", "
Fletcher is now a toddler, and Ms Knight says she had good support when she had her second son.(ABC News: Nicole Asher)
", "The now mother of two had a second son\u00a0when her firstborn, Fletcher,\u00a0was two-and-a-half years old.", "\"I was really nervous but my psychiatrist really supported me through my pregnancy,\" Ms Knight said.", "\"I really felt in the days after having him completely different to how I felt after having my firstborn.\""]
